string.value: The Stranger I met in Naora Hospital was shockingly a Ghost! She was waiting for Naora, not knowing that she herself is dead... This Stranger wouldn't believe that she is dead. She told me that she needs #b100 Charms of the Undead#k in order to live again, and asked me to find it. Can she really live again with just these...? \n\n#t4000008# #c4000008#/100

#p1052105# who I met in Naora Hospital was a Ghost. She was staying in the Hospital, not knowing that she's dead. She couldn't live again with #t4000008#. It seems that she already knew she couldn't make it...I really hope she returns to heaven.
Ah ... this may be cracked a little, but I can definitely see myself in it.
Thank you so much. I need to get out of here as soon as I get these bandages off. It's waaay too cold in here.

What the!!!! No way!!!! What ... what happened here?? Why can't I see myself through the mirror? Did I ... die?????? No way, that cannot be true!! I can't be dead yet!!! Hey there, please help me out once more!!

When you defeat the #b#o2230101#s#k, they gives off #b#t4000008##k, and from what I've heard, that charm has the power to revive the dead. Please get me the charm. #b100 #t4000008##k and maybe I may come back alive.
How can you be so cold!!! I'll be cursing you forever!!!
Ahh, thanks for getting me the charms. I can't believe you got me all that ... well, I'll have to be honest with you. Even with those charms, I don't think I'll be coming back to life.

Even if I come back alive with these charms, I won't be fully alive, per se, kind of like a zombie. I can't believe I figured this out just now ... but I will never forget the fact that you took great lengths to help me out. Thank you so so much.
Do you like the cape that I gave you? It's a cape made of the devastating powers of the Charms of the Undead. I'll see you ... around ... somewhere ... somehow ...
You didn't get #b100 #t4000008#s#k? Please hurry ... man, it's cold around here.
